channel.title: ;)how do i get to put pics on posts?
channel.description:
I know there is a site for it :P i need to know exactly what to do to put pictures :D
---killa

item.title: ;)how do i get to put pics on posts?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Ok.

Go to imageshack.us and sign up. Then, press Prt Scr (above home on your keyboard) and open up paint or another GPU program. Then, go to file, paste, and the image should pop up. Save it, go to imageshack, host it, go into My Images, click the little i over the pic, and you should see alot of stuff. Copy the one that starts with [img] and paste it on here.

Walla!

Read full topic
item.source: ;)how do i get to put pics on posts?
